Maptime Albany is Live

We’re working hard on getting the Maptime Albany chapter up and running! Stay tuned for details on our first meetup and contact @brymcbride or @katydecorah if you are interested in helping out.

Join the Maptime Albany Meetup group to keep track of our Meetup events.
